features: Sufficient to Use: there are 96 pieces of baby wipes bulk in 8 different colors, 12 pieces for each color; The quantity of reusable baby wipes is enough to meet the baby's daily use and replacement needs
Soft and Comfortable: these flannel cloth baby wipes are made of quality cotton and flannel material, soft and comfortable and unbleached, friendly to your baby's skin

Color Stitched Edges: these cloth wipes have 8 different colored edges, including purple, rose red, green, blue, yellow, dark blue, red and light gray, precisely woven and finely stitched, stable in structure, not easy to fall off

Lightweight and Portable: these cloth diaper wipes are approx. 8 x 8 inches/ 20.5 x 20.5 cm, small in size, light in weight, stackable for easy use, easy to carry and store, you can take it with you when you travel
Reusable and Washable: these reusable diaper wipes are easy to wash, washable and quick drying, allowing you to use them over and over again, widely suitable for baby cleaning, or applied as diapers
body.description: Features: These reusable baby wipes are ideal gifts for your families, friends, colleagues and neighbors who have babies, especially on baby showers, birthday parties, baptism parties and more, and they will be very happy to receive such considerate and practical gifts. These newborn baby wipes have 8 colors, soft and comfortable to touch, provide your baby with a nice use experience. Specifications: Main color: purple, rose red, green, blue, yellow, dark blue, red, light grayMain material: flannel cottonSize: approx. 8 x 8 inches/ 20.5 x 20.5 cmPackage includes: 96 x Cloth baby wipesWarm notes: Please allow slight deviation due to manual measurement. Please allow slight color differences due to different monitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softer and nicer than tissues and toilet paper
reviews.reviewText: I bought these when I was sick, and when tissues (nice soft ones) make my nose raw, these do not. My partner uses them to dry after using the bidet and I no longer have to eat toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful! Very minimal shrinkage, very absorbant!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this perfect size as family cloth for toilet use. Wash before you use them for maximum absorbency. Fine to use hot water in wash and put them in the dryer. Very minimal shrinkage which I was very very happy about. I have washed and dried them many times I highly recommend the quantity is good also I also like the different colored edges so if you want to segregate use by color that works very well. I will be buying these as gifts for other family members!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for wiping the behind!
reviews.reviewText: I use these as a toilet paper substitute. I have a toilet bidet that I use after I use the toilet and I dry myself off with these baby wipes. I have washed them many times and they are still in good condition. They have saved me massive amounts of money on toilet paper. I have tried other rags before, but these are awesome. I would definitely buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so soft and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I got a bidet attachment and a bunch of these wipes and they work perfectly. Super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Totally unsatisfactory as far as wipes go
reviews.reviewText: They do NOT absorb water and are totally unsatisfactory as far as wipes go.
